In filter mode you can remove rooms you do not wish to see.
A room will be hidden if it meets one or more of the following criteria: it is not in your selected language, it contains a filtered out word, it has been Temp Hidden, or its creator is ghostlisted.
The Language filter allows to view only rooms in a particular language. Other filters can be used to remove objectionable content from your view.
Use "Filter out terms" to hide all rooms containing those words. Note this only checks the room name, not the description.

Click on a room in this view to instantly hide that one room (until next login) and/or ghostlist the player who made the room (saved permanently until you remove them from ghostlist). Use the buttons at bottom right to select which action to take.

Use "Show hidden rooms" to show all the normally hidden rooms in case you want to unhide a particular room. Clicking a hidden room will take all actions necessary to show it (remove words from filter, remove room from Temp Hidden list, and/or remove creator from ghostlist).

Note that rooms hidden because of the language setting do not show on "Show hidden rooms". All other hidden rooms will show there. A confirmation will be shown if unhiding a room requires unghostlisting anyone or removing filter words.
